vistra.app.algorithm

Class DefaultAlgorithm

  • java.lang.Object
    • vistra.app.algorithm.DefaultAlgorithm
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAlgorithm
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SimpleSteps

    public class DefaultAlgorithm
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAlgorithm
    A default algorithm implementing the interface IAlgorithm by extending AbstractAlgorithm. Does nothing on traverse().

    This algorithm is used as default choice in an algorithm-combo-box.

    Author:
    Roland Bruggmann (brugr9@bfh.ch)
